alert.note: Alert for Rock Island (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS QuadCities (Eastern Iowa and Northwestern Illinois - Quad Cities)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 24 at 6:55PM CDT by NWS QuadCities
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Rock Island, western Scott and northeastern Muscatine Counties through 745 PM CDT... At 654 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Montpelier, or 11 miles southeast of Durant, moving northeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Davenport, Eldridge, Walcott, Blue Grass, Buffalo, Andalusia, Donahue, Montpelier, Fairport, Edgington, Maysville, Clark`s Ferry Recreation Area, West Lake Park, New Era, Pleasant Prairie, Mississippi Valley Fairgrounds, Davenport Municipal Airport, Buffalo Shores, Loud Thunder Scout Camp, and Plainview. This includes the following highways... Interstate 80 in Iowa between mile markers 283 and 296. Interstate 280 between mile markers 1 and 8. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
